message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.MM 

The paper deals with the task of semantic image segmentation, which is a core problem in computer vision. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also presents a new method for training Conditional Random Fields (CRFs), which is a machine learning technique. This suggests that the paper could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), or cs.CL (Computation and Language). Finally, the paper deals with large-scale experiments and datasets, which could also make it relevant to cs.MM (Multimedia).
